attributes.action: It is now time to deal with ISIL
attributes.additional_details: Isil have committed atrocity after atrocity,  regardless of your views on the original war it isa duty of the uUK and USA to stop this menace. The individuals involved have no concern for international legal requirements regarding treatment of prisoners and are quite happy to murder innocent people purely based upon their nationality. If ever military action is justified then this is one instance.
